# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  README bug1370.cir tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1370/bug1370.cir COMMAND ${XYCE_BINARY} bug1370.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1370/bug1370.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;transline")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1370/bug1370.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP bug1370.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1370/bug1370.cir.verify COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug1370.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1370/bug1370.cir.prn bug1370.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1370/bug1370.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED bug1370.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1370/bug1370.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;transline")
endif()
